6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:"Whoever catches up with a Rak'ah of the prayer, then he has caught up with the prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَدْرَكَ رَكْعَةً مِنَ الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever Catches Up With A Rak'ah Of The Prayer
